abstracts.cdata!:
The Public Enterprise Institutional
            Development Project to assist the Government in acquiring
            the necessary technical and administrative capacity to
            implement PE reforms and to improve PE management. It aims
            to accomplish this by: (a) supporting a PE technical unit in
            the Prime Minister's Office; (b) providing short-term
            consultant services for implementation of PE reform
            measures; (c) supporting management training programs; and
            (d) auditing and accounting assistance. In addition, the
            project intends to provide (e) advisory and consultant
            services to improve management and restructure several key
            enterprises; and (f) consultant services for other critical
            structural adjustment tasks. As a result of these actions,
            the project will support a far reaching PE reform program as
            a key element of the Congo's structural adjustment effort.
